text:
I hired 2 maids from Frondosa. 1st one for myself & I had problems with her. Edmund go over the extra mile to have a 2 hrs late night face to face counselling with her. The session was helpful for both of us to understand each other & her to understand her duties.

Thereafter I hired another maid for my dad. I was very clear on what I am looking for and described to Edmund. He recommended one that fully matches with my expectation. Had a lot of hiccups with MOM in the process of approving the WP, Edmund did his duty to follow up closely on it, knowing how urgent this is to me. The maid is here now & I am happy that this was what I was looking for. I can have ease at heart knowing that someone I can trust is with my dad when I can't be.

Thanks Edmund for the excellent service provided.

Was urgently needing to find a replacement helper as current helper wanted to go back home in a short notice.

Soon from Frondosa was very helpful. He actively helps us source resumes and provides very useful advices.  Would recommend Soon to friends who need to find helpers.

Very responsive and helpful to bring us to the process of getting a care giver for elderly. When the extra mile to liaise with all necessary parties to make the process as pain free as possible. Thank you edmund!

Edmund of Frondosa was very good.  He was detailed , quick in sourcing and selecting the domestic helper that I was looking for.  Eventhough we eventually did not close with Edmund, he nevertheless did present suitable helpers.
Edmund from Frondosa Employment Agency was quick to respond to my enquiry. Although the helpers that he suggested were not suitable for my household, he kept trying.
